name: Target
description: The Target module provides a unified interface for adding interactive targets to players, vehicles, entities, and zones. It supports various targeting systems like ox_target and qb-target.

clientFunctions.name: FixOptions
clientFunctions.description: Internal function that fixes options passed to fit alternative target systems. Normalizes options for compatibility between different targeting systems.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Array of target option configurations to normalize

clientFunctions.name: AddBoxZone
clientFunctions.description: Creates a box-shaped target zone at specified coordinates.
clientFunctions.syntax: Bridge.Target.AddBoxZone(name, coords, size, heading, options, debug)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of the box {length, width, height}

clientFunctions.name: AddGlobalPlayer
clientFunctions.description: Adds target options to all players globally.

clientFunctions.name: AddGlobalVehicle
clientFunctions.description: Adds target options to all vehicles globally.

clientFunctions.name: AddLocalEntity
clientFunctions.description: Adds target options to specific local entities.

parameters.name: entities
parameters.description: Entity handle or array of entity handles

clientFunctions.name: AddModel
clientFunctions.description: Adds target options to all entities of specified model(s).

parameters.name: models
parameters.description: Model hash or array of model hashes

clientFunctions.name: AddSphereZone
clientFunctions.description: Creates a spherical target zone at specified coordinates.

parameters.name: heading
parameters.description: Rotation heading (may not apply to all systems)

clientFunctions.name: DisableTargeting
clientFunctions.description: Enables or disables the targeting system entirely.

parameters.name: bool
parameters.description: True to disable targeting, false to enable

clientFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Disable targeting
Bridge.Target.DisableTargeting(true)

-- Re-enable targeting
Bridge.Target.DisableTargeting(false)

clientFunctions.name: RemoveGlobalPlayer
clientFunctions.description: Removes all target options from players.

clientFunctions.name: RemoveGlobalVehicle
clientFunctions.description: Removes target options from all vehicles.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Array of target options to remove (by name)

clientFunctions.name: RemoveLocalEntity
clientFunctions.description: Removes target options from specific local entities.

parameters.name: entities
parameters.description: Entity handle or array of entity handles

parameters.name: optionNames
parameters.description: Option name(s) to remove, or nil to remove all

clientFunctions.name: RemoveModel
clientFunctions.description: Removes all target options from a specific model.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Model hash to remove targets from

clientFunctions.name: RemoveZone
clientFunctions.description: Removes a target zone by name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the zone to remove
